column4: question. i built a program where is the most common place to drop it away from my desktop?
Depending on the program, most get installed in "/usr/bin"? You could put it there and create a shortcut to your desktop.
okay now whats the best way to move it there with rights?
sudo nautilus in a terminal. Then copy from your desktop using that window and copy it anywhere. Please use caustion when browsing your drive as root though.
